objects.text:
Professional-grade anti-aging formula • Sleek modern design
Advanced moisturizing technology • Premium silver-tone packaging

product_details.name: MM Luxury Anti-Aging Skincare Set - Premium Beauty Duo
product_details.description:
• Premium silver-tone packaging for an luxurious aesthetic
• Professional-grade anti-aging formulation
• Dual-product system for comprehensive skincare
• Sleek, modern dispenser design for precise application
• Travel-friendly size and secure packaging
• Advanced moisturizing and skin perfecting technology
• High-end cosmetic grade materials
• Elegant minimalist design with MM branding
• Perfect for daily skincare routine
• Professional salon-quality beauty products

banner_details:
This banner presents a high-end skincare promotion with a luxurious and modern aesthetic. The background uses a rich gradient from deep charcoal (#101010) to medium grey (#303030) with a soft radial glow emphasizing the center. The top section prominently features a bold, uppercase headline (`heading`) in white, followed by a refined serif subheading (`subheading`) in a lighter grey tone. In the center, there's a product image (`product_image`) showcasing a sleek, silver-tone packaging. Beneath, a concise bullet-style description (`description`) highlights product benefits in silver-grey. The price (`price`) is displayed boldly in white, with a "SHOP NOW" call-to-action (`cta`) placed on a light silver rectangular button (`cta_background`).

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: #101010  
- Deep Grey: #303030  
- Light Grey: #C0C0C0  
- Pale Silver: #D3D3D3  
- Pure White: #FFFFFF  
- Button Text Black: #000000
product_color: The product image uses a modern and sleek color palette dominated by cool metallic tones and soft gradients to convey a sense of luxury and refinement. The main colors include silver (#C0C0C0), charcoal grey (#3A3A3A), white (#FFFFFF), and subtle touches of blue-grey (#A6B2BD). The metallic silver of the containers reflects light, adding depth and highlighting the clean design. Water droplets on the products enhance freshness, while the contrast between the reflective black lid and the soft silver base draws attention. An advertisement banner could benefit from a clean, minimalistic palette of silver, white, and charcoal for elegance and sophistication.
